testimonials.text: Sharma Space transformed our apartment into a dream home. Every detail was perfect.
testimonials.author: Priya Sharma

faq.question: What is included in residential interior design services in Bangalore?
faq.answer: Our residential design includes space planning, 3D visualization, material selection, custom furniture design, and complete project execution with quality assurance.

faq.question: How much does residential interior design cost in Bangalore?
faq.answer: Residential interior design costs range from ₹8,00,000 to ₹50,00,000 depending on space size, design complexity, and material choices. We provide detailed quotes after consultation.

services.title: Commercial Design
services.metaTitle: Commercial Interior Design Bangalore | Office Interiors | Sharma Space
services.metaDescription: Professional commercial interior design in Bangalore. Office spaces, retail stores, restaurants. Boost productivity with expert design.
services.description: Functional and inspiring workspaces for businesses that boost productivity and reflect your brand identity. Creating environments that enhance employee satisfaction and client impressions.

image.alt: Commercial interior design Bangalore office space

process.title: Business Analysis
process.description: Understanding your business needs and brand identity

process.title: Space Planning
process.description: Optimizing layout for productivity and flow

testimonials.text: Our new office design has significantly improved team collaboration and client meetings.
testimonials.author: Rajesh Kumar

faq.question: What does commercial interior design include in Bangalore?
faq.answer: Commercial design includes space planning, brand integration, furniture selection, lighting design, technology setup, and complete project management for offices, retail, and hospitality spaces.

faq.question: How long does commercial interior design take in Bangalore?
faq.answer: Commercial projects typically take 3-6 months depending on space size and complexity. We provide detailed timelines during the planning phase.
